package.name: rapp_map_server
package.description: Rapp_map_server is based on map_server ROS package (http://wiki.ros.org/map_server). Rapp_map_server advertises following services: -> ${node_name}/get_map - responds with nav_msgs/OccupancyGrid map needed by rapp_static_layer plugin of costmap_2d ROS package during path planning sequence, -> ${node_name}/upload_map - generates map_name.yaml configuration file and saves map_name.png data file in /home/rapp/rapp_platform_files/rapp/${user_name}/ directory.
